attributes.additional_details: Children of non working families have additional funding given to the school, for that childs extra educational costs. My daughter has a PGL (residential educational) trip which to working families will cost £165 this cost has been covered for children are eligible for free school meals (families who live on benefits). We are a working family who are being economically squeezed as a lot of poeple who work are, pay cuts, rising inflation and there seems to be very little help for those who put into the economy.
